description: Formal schema of the Evaluation and Report Language (EARL) 1.0
label: Evaluation and Report Language (EARL) 1.0 Schema

Assertion.description: a statement that embodies the results of a test
Assertion.label: Assertion

Assertor.description: an entity such as a person, a software tool, an organization, or any other grouping that carries out a test collectively
Assertor.label: Assertor

CannotTell.description: the class of outcomes to denote an undetermined outcome
CannotTell.label: Undetermined

OutcomeValue.description: a discrete value that describes a resulting condition from carrying out the test
OutcomeValue.label: Outcome Value

Fail.description: the class of outcomes to denote failing a test
Fail.label: Fail

NotApplicable.description: the class of outcomes to denote the test is not applicable
NotApplicable.label: Not applicable

NotTested.description: the class of outcomes to denote the test has not been carried out
NotTested.label: Not tested

Pass.description: the class of outcomes to denote passing a test
Pass.label: Pass

Software.description: any piece of software such as an authoring tool, browser, or evaluation tool
Software.label: Software

TestCase.description: an atomic test, usually one that is a partial test for a requirement
TestCase.label: Test Case

TestCriterion.description: a testable statement, usually one that can be passed or failed
TestCriterion.label: Test Criterion

TestMode.description: describes how a test was carried out
TestMode.label: Test Mode

TestRequirement.description: a higher-level requirement that is tested by executing one or more sub-tests
TestRequirement.label: Test Requirement

TestResult.description: the actual result of performing the test
TestResult.label: Test Result

TestSubject.description: the class of things that have been tested against some test criterion
TestSubject.label: Test Subject

info.description: additional warnings or error messages in a human-readable form
info.label: Info

mainAssertor.description: assertor that is primarily responsible for performing the test
mainAssertor.label: Main Assertor

mode.description: mode in which the test was performed
mode.label: Mode

pointer.description: location within a test subject that are most relevant to a test result
pointer.label: Pointer
